name: Apple Dessert Nachos
author: Greg Feldman
summary: Very quick and easy dessert dish that will be gone in seconds! This recipe is easily adaptable to individual tastes so feel free to experiment with what you like and enjoy!
directions: Combine marshmallows and butter in a large pot over medium heat; cook and stir until melted and smooth, about 5 minutes
Combine caramels and half-and-half in a microwave-safe bowl
Heat in the microwave in 30-second intervals, stirring after each interval, until melted, about 2 minutes
Arrange apple slices on a large serving dish
Drizzle marshmallow mixture over the apples
Drizzle caramel sauce and chocolate syrup on top
